trans-unit.source: The following sample is for copying data from a Blob to Azure SQL with type conversions.
trans-unit.target: The following sample is for copying data from a Blob to Azure SQL with type conversions.

trans-unit.source: Suppose the Blob dataset is in CSV format and contains 3 columns.
trans-unit.target: Suppose the Blob dataset is in CSV format and contains 3 columns.

trans-unit.source: One of them is a datetime column with a custom datetime format using abbreviated French names for day of the week.
trans-unit.target: One of them is a datetime column with a custom datetime format using abbreviated French names for day of the week.

trans-unit.source: You will define the Blob Source dataset as follows along with type definitions for the columns.
trans-unit.target: You will define the Blob Source dataset as follows along with type definitions for the columns.

trans-unit.source: Given the SQL type to .NET type mapping table above you would define the Azure SQL table with the following schema.
trans-unit.target: Given the SQL type to .NET type mapping table above you would define the Azure SQL table with the following schema.

trans-unit.source: Next you will define the Azure SQL dataset as follows.
trans-unit.target: Next you will define the Azure SQL dataset as follows.

trans-unit.source: Note: You do not need to specify “structure” section with type information since the type information is already specified in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Note: You do not need to specify “structure” section with type information since the type information is already specified in the underlying data store.

trans-unit.source: In this case data factory will automatically do the type conversions including the Datetime field with the custom datetime format using the fr-fr culture when moving data from Blob to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: In this case data factory will automatically do the type conversions including the Datetime field with the custom datetime format using the fr-fr culture when moving data from Blob to Azure SQL.
